H0.text: what kind of guitar did george harrison use. Gibson Les Paul

H1.text: what kind of guitar did george harrison use. Rickenbacker 360

H2.text: what kind of guitar did george harrison use. Epiphone Casino

H3.text: what kind of guitar did george harrison use. Fender Stratocaster

A4.text: In July 1968, Clapton gave him a Gibson Les Paul that had been stripped of its original finish and stained cherry red

A5.text: In early 1966, Harrison and Lennon each purchased Epiphone Casinos, which they used on Revolver

A6.text: In December 1964, George Harrison and John Lennon acquired Stratocasters and used them for 'Help!', and onwards.

A7.text: The double unison guitar solo on 'Nowhere Man', was played by Harrison and Lennon on their new Stratocasters.
